name: places/ChIJT7-RKQxZwokRZIs_Xfq94MQ
formattedAddress: 510 E 80th St #2, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 510 E 80th St #2, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text:
I recently visited Line Dental after hearing about their opening. Scheduling an appointment through their user-friendly website was a breeze, and easy enough for all ages.

Dr. Lew displayed exceptional attentiveness, with a genuine concern for my dental well-being. No pressure for unnecessary procedures—just a clear explanation of what was needed. It seems like I have found a new hidden gem dental office for my family in the neighborhood. I highly recommend my fellow Upper East Side residents to go visit for top-notch dental care and a seamless experience.

originalText.text:
Visiting Line Dental was an outstanding experience from start to finish, and it’s clear that they stand out in the realm of dental care. One of the most impressive aspects of this office is their commitment to utilizing cutting-edge technology. All the equipment is brand new and state-of-the-art, which not only instills confidence in their services but also significantly enhances the treatment process.

What truly sets Line Dental apart is their all-inclusive approach to dental procedures. Everything is done on-site, negating the need for any outsourcing. This efficiency is a game-changer, especially for someone like me who needed night guards for teeth grinding. Instead of the lengthy process I was expecting, my custom night guards were made right there in the office, drastically cutting down on wait times and repeat visits.

The expertise of the dental team is undeniable, with both dentists boasting training from the prestigious NYU dental school. Their knowledge and professionalism were evident throughout my treatment, providing a sense of assurance and trust in their capabilities.

Overall, my experience at Line Dental was nothing short of excellent. The combination of top-tier technology, comprehensive in-house services, and highly skilled dentists makes this office a standout. I highly recommend Line Dental to anyone seeking high-quality, efficient dental care.

originalText.text: Dr. Lew is honestly such a caring dentist. He was very attentive to my problem. The whole experience made me feel at ease, and I was not nervous at all! I would 100% recommend going to see Dr. Lew!

originalText.text: Dr. Lew is professional and experienced. He is very detail-oriented, patient and most importantly really cares about the patient. The staffs are incredibly helpful and communicative. I definitely pick this clinic as #1 in NYC.

originalText.text: What an amazing experience! Everyone was so welcoming and warm. Even though he knew I wasn’t from the city, he took the time to understand my situation and help me as I needed. Would definitely recommend! Thank you! :)
